Very nice treatment and cooperative nursing staff all life care facilities are available on affordable cost.

Our patient was admitted at Mangala Dandge Chavan Hospital when he was admitted in ICU his condition was a bit serious but the doctor and all the staff handled the situation very well and soon stabilized him properly.. and he was given general word soon after a day. Shifted in. We have brought the patient here for second admission. Everyone is cooperating very well
Dr. Purva and Dhanashree Sister were very helpful, after seeing them I felt like a part of our family and they took care of our patients so well.

My grandmother was admitted to Gangu Shinde Chavan Hospital for treatment. The doctors at the hospital started treatment immediately and my grandmother's health improved quickly. The staff there were also very prompt and attentive. Patient was interrogated with indifference. And specialists doctor was also calling for treatment.
And even in Beela, no extra charges were applied for no reason, my grandmother received good and excellent treatment in Chavan Hospital in budget.
So I will suggest others to seek treatment at Chavan Hospital.

Chandrabhaga padalkare maji aai chavan hospital mdhe admit hoti khup chan anubhav ala changlya prakare upchar kele sarva staff ne khup chaglya prakare sahkarya kele Billing chy madam ni sudha khup changlya prakare margadarshan kele tychya amhi khup manapasun abhari ahot

Paishant Name- Anshuman Avinash Pasalkar
Year- 3 years
Treatment- Burn Inspection
Me, Ashwini Avinashi Pasalkar patient chi aie. Maza Mulga Anshuman 18 April 2022 roji garm panamade padune 40% burn zala hota. Tananer amhi tayla sauna hospital made admit kele hote parantu taychi tabet ajune kharab zalamule amhi tayla Bharti hospital la 25 April la geun alo parantu tachi Tabet critical zalyamule ani burne patient asla mule punamade kontyach hospital made tayla admission milale nahi. Sagle raste band zalyananter eke ashecha Kiran disava tasa aplya chawan hospital che Dr. Ajinkya chawan yani maza kade admit karu amhi treatment karto ase sangitle.tananter geli 25 April 2022 te 13 May 2022 Paryant tacha ver uttam treatment karun Anshuman la discharge dila.Dr. Sachin Raghuwanshi (Paediatrician) and Dr. Sushrut Tathed (surgery) yani khup uttam treatment Keli.
Amhi Pasalkar & Maral Family Chawan Hospital Madil Dr. Ajinkya sir, Dr.Deepak sir ,Dr.Mayur sir Dr. Vanita ani kulkarni sisiter anshu cha aie, anshu cha Mama Amol brother, sarve sister kavita mavashi, shruti mavashi, Anjali mavashi ani nehami kurkure anun denare anshu che Satish maske mama , vashali aie, babita aie,arune baba,rohan mama yani khup anshu la jeev lavla .tachi khup Chan kalji getli.amhi ya sarvanche khup khup abhari ahot.

Ajinkya sir family member sudha anshuchi tabet vicharun betun maghe jayche .Pharmacy madil sarve staff ne sudha khup jeev lavla hota. Yeta jatana vicharayche. Security madil baba sudha khup dir dyache mala.
Amhi chawan hospital madel sarvanche khup runi ahot aje maza mulga anshu keval tancha mule ahi.üôèüôèüôèüôè
